engine.components

Class SpriteComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.entity.EntityComponent
      • engine.components.SpriteComponent

  • public class SpriteComponent
extends EntityComponent
    Draws a sprite where this entity is.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteComponent

        public SpriteComponent(Entity entity,
               double width,
               double height,
               SpriteSheet sheet,
               int spriteIndex,
               Color color)
        Creates a new SpriteComponent
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        width - How wide of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen width is 2.
        height - How tall of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen height is 2.
        sheet - The sheet containing this sprite.
        spriteIndex - The index of this sprite in the sheet.
        color - The color applied to the sprite.

      • SpriteComponent

        public SpriteComponent(Entity entity,
               double width,
               double height,
               SpriteSheet sheet,
               double frameTime,
               Color color)
        Creates a new SpriteComponent
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        width - How wide of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen width is 2.
        height - How tall of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen height is 2.
        sheet - The sheet containing the sprites for the animation.
        frameTime - How long each sprite in the sheet is displayed.
        color - The color applied to each sprite.

      • SpriteComponent

        public SpriteComponent(Entity entity,
               double width,
               double height,
               SpriteSheet sheet,
               int[] indices,
               double frameTime,
               Color color)
        Creates a new SpriteComponent
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        width - How wide of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen width is 2.
        height - How tall of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen height is 2.
        sheet - The sheet containing the sprites for the animation.
        indices - The index of each sprite in the animation, in order.
        frameTime - How long each sprite in the sheet is displayed.
        color - The color applied to each sprite.

      • SpriteComponent

        public SpriteComponent(Entity entity,
               double width,
               double height,
               SpriteSheet[] sheets,
               int[] indices,
               double frameTime,
               Color color)
        Creates a new SpriteComponent
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        width - How wide of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen width is 2.
        height - How tall of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen height is 2.
        sheets - The sheets containing the sprites for the animation.
        indices - The index of each sprite in the animation, in order.
        frameTime - How long each sprite in the sheet is displayed.
        color - The color applied to each sprite.

      • SpriteComponent

        public SpriteComponent(Entity entity,
               double width,
               double height,
               SpriteSheet[] sheets,
               int[] indices,
               double[] frameTimes,
               int[] nextFrames,
               Color color)
        Creates a new SpriteComponent
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        width - How wide of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen width is 2.
        height - How tall of an area the sprite consumes, normalized such that the screen height is 2.
        sheets - The sheets containing the sprites for the animation.
        indices - The index of each sprite in the animation, in order.
        frameTimes - How long each frame of animation is displayed for
        nextFrames - Which animation frame is displayed after which.
        color - The color applied to each sprite.
